item.title: Burgundy Roses – Spray
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Burgundy Roses – Spray appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Flowers

Burgundy Roses – Spray

$45.00

Burgundy Roses – Spray

$45.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Roses – Spray Tags: Burgundy, Filler Flower, Volume Flower
Flower Details

Overview

  • These blooms are known for their versatility and range of beautiful colours.
  • Each stem has approximately 3-5 mini roses.
  • Spray roses add beautiful texture to classic rose bouquets and are a lovely accent with any other style of arrangement.
  • Some of the blooms will remain closed, which adds a unique texture to your bouquets.

Number of Stems

  • 10 stems per bunch, approximately 3-5 blooms per stem.

Flower Design Type

  • Volume/Filler
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • These are a “cluster” flower, within the cluster you might see a small sub-stem with no bloom on it…that’s normal, just cut that stem off!
  • Spray roses arrive closed bloom, they take a day or two to open up!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for including spray roses in your arrangements:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 5-7 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 3-5 stems
  • Boutineers: 1 stem
  • Corsages: 1-2 stems
  • Centerpieces: 4-5 stems
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stems
Product Video

Related products

  • Red Alstromeria

    $30.00

  • Blushing Bride Protea

    $50.00

  • Sunset Leucadendron

    $25.00

  • Orange Alstromeria

    $30.00

The post Burgundy Roses – Spray appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Purple Snapdragons
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Purple Snapdragons appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Flowers

Purple Snapdragons

$30.00

Purple Snapdragons

$30.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Snapdragons Tags: Line flower, Purple
Flower Details

Overview

  • Snapdragons are great for large arrangements, given their tall size and have great presence.
  • They are a lovely option for upright wildflower-style bouquets and centrepieces.
  • Available in a wide range of beautiful shades and colours.
  • Their long spender stalks have blossoms from top to bottom, they’re often used to add in height and diversity to arrangements.
  • Depending on the time of year, they are grown locally, or imported from overseas.

Number of Stems

  • 5 stems per bunch

Flower Design Type

  • Line Flower
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • Be sure to remove all foliage carefully before putting into water.
  • Snaps tend to curve as gravity takes over, so make sure they are kept in a supportive vase until you arrange them.
  • Stems are tall and can be susceptible to bending – take care when opening and processing!
  • Lower buds may fade sooner than the rest of the stem – feel free to snip off individual buds to extend the life!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of snapdragons:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 3-5 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1 -3 stems
  • Boutineers: N/A too large
  • Corsages: N/A too large
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stem
Product Video

Related products

  • Pink Aster Matsumoto

    $30.00

  • Anenome – White Panda

    $55.00

  • Sunflowers

    $30.00

  • Orange Alstromeria

    $30.00

The post Purple Snapdragons appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Flowers

Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom

$25.00

Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Mums - Pom Pom Tags: Burgundy, Filler Flower, Volume Flower
Flower Details

Overview

  • Mums are long lasting, hardy, and versatile, available in so many colours!
  • Pom pom mums are super cute, like a button! A great choice for adding colour and texture to garden-style or wildflower bouquets.
  • These mums have multiple blooms per stem which can be separated to get the most out of your stems.
  • Mums do very well out of water for extended periods of time. Perfect for boutonnieres, tablescaping, or tucking into your garland for a beautiful pop of colour.
  • Colour and shape variation is natural and part of the joy of chrysanthemums
  • Check out the photos/videos to see what an average bunch size looks like.

Number of Stems

  • 10 stems per bunch

Flower Design Type

  • Volume/Filler flower
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • Ensure all foliage is removed as mums are especially prone to rot if left in murky or leafy water.
  • Your bundles may arrive with some broken blooms – this is normal! Use these shorter blooms for bud vases, table scaping, or even boutonnieres!
  • These are a “cluster” flower, within the cluster you might see a small sub-stem with no bloom on it…that’s normal, just cut that stem off!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of pom pom mums:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 3 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1-2 stems
  • Boutineers: 1-2 blooms
  • Corsages: 2-3 blooms
  • Centerpieces: 3-5 stems
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stems
Product Video

Related products

  • Pink Aster Matsumoto

    $30.00

  • Scabiosa Pods

    $25.00

  • Purple Alstromeria

    $30.00

  • Dianthus

    $30.00

The post Burgundy Mums – Pom Pom appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Deep Red Mums – Spray
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Deep Red Mums – Spray appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Flowers

Deep Red Mums – Spray

$25.00

Deep Red Mums – Spray

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Mums - Spray Tags: Filler Flower, Red, Volume Flower
Flower Details

Overview

  • Mums are long lasting, hardy, and versatile, available in so many colours!
  • Spray mums have multiple blooms branching out from the top of the stem!
  • These florals are a great choice for adding colour and texture to garden-style or wildflower bouquets.
  • These mums have multiple blooms per stem which can be separated to get the most out of your stems.
  • Mums do very well out of water for extended periods of time. Perfect for boutonnieres, tablescaping, or tucking into your garland for a beautiful pop of colour.
  • Colour and bloom variation is natural and part of the joy of chrysanthemums (note, your mums may not be exactly as the photograph shows, mums are known for their variation!)
  • Check out the photos/videos to see what an average bunch size looks like.

Number of Stems

  • 10 stems per bunch

Flower Design Type

  • Volume/Filler flower
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • Ensure all foliage is removed as mums are especially prone to rot if left in murky or leafy water.
  • Your bundles may arrive with some broken blooms – this is normal! Use these shorter blooms for bud vases, table scaping, or even boutonnieres!
  • These are a “cluster” flower, within the cluster you might see a small sub-stem with no bloom on it…that’s normal, just cut that stem off!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of spray mums: 

  • Bridal Bouquet: 5-7 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 3-5 stems
  • Boutineers: 1 stem
  • Corsages: 1-2 stems
  • Centerpieces: 4-5 stems
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stems
Product Video

  • Sunset Leucadendron

    $25.00

  • Babies Breath

    $30.00

  • Red Alstromeria

    $30.00

  • Purple Aster Matsumoto

    $30.00

item.title: Purple Stock
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Purple Stock appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Flowers

Purple Stock

$45.00

Purple Stock

$45.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Stock Tags: Filler Flower, Line flower, Purple, Volume Flower
Flower Details

Overview:

  • Stock (also known as Matthiola) is a beautifully scented flower, known for its strong smell, and its popularity in wedding bouquets.
  • Stock has multiple blooms per bunch and adds oodles of texture and visual interest to bouquets.
  • Note that it may be unavailable certain times of the year, if so, we will contact you to discuss an appropriate substitute

Number of Stems:

  • 10 stems per bunch

Flower Design Type

  • Stock falls into two flower design type categories… it has a large number of blooms on a single stalk, so you could use it as a line flower. If you prefer, pinch off some of the blooms on the bottom to give it a more “compact” appearance and use it as a filler/volume flower.
  • Filler/Volume flower
  • Line Flower
Flower Care

For general flower care and unpacking instructions, visit our blog post here

Specific Flower Care
  • The bottom blooms on stock will occasionally be stanky, simply remove them
  • Stock doesn’t like extreme temperatures, if your wedding is in the heat of the summer keep this in mind to avoid disappointment!
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of stock:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 3-5 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1-3 stems
  • Boutineers: N/A – too large
  • Corsages: N/A – too large
  • Centerpieces: 3-5 stems
  • Large Arrangements: 1- 2 bunches

Related products

  • Anenome – White Panda

    $55.00

  • White Hydrangea

    $35.00

  • Matricaria (chamomile)

    $25.00

  • Sunset Leucadendron

    $25.00

The post Purple Stock appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Ivory Roses – Standard
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Ivory Roses – Standard appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Bulk Flowers

Ivory Roses – Standard

$125.00

Ivory Roses – Standard

$125.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Categories: Bulk Flowers, Roses - Standard Tags: Accent Flower, Brown
Flower Details

Overview

  • Roses are the classic wedding flower and symbolize love and romance.
  • They are hardy, long lasting and available in a wide range of stunning colours and shades
  • Boasting a beautiful fragrance and soft, lush petals that open over time and work perfectly for any style of arrangement, bouquet, or decor.

Number of Stems

  • 24 stems per bunch

Flower Design Type

  • Accent Flower
Flower Care

RECEIVING YOUR ROSES

  • Your roses will arrive looking tired, they’ve been on a journey! Don’t worry, with some rest and water, they’ll perk up.
  • Within each bunch, the roses are packed in two layers to ensure protection during shipping. From the top angle, it will appear that you only have 12 rose stems in the bunch; however, below this layer there is a second layer containing the remaining 13 roses (yes, we threw in a bonus one because we’re sweet like that).
  • We ship our roses in bud form. Once the rose is processed and hydrated, the bloom will open to a much larger size. It takes 1-2 days for them to open up.
  • We ship our roses with guard petals intact to protect the roses while travelling. These petals might cause the rose to look distorted, discolored and/or bruised. Once you are ready to process your roses, you may need to remove up to 8 guard petals per rose to reveal the pristine quality rose bloom.
  • When your boxes arrive, it is important to get your flowers in water as quickly as possible.

UNWRAPPING

  • Count the bunches as you are pulling them out of the box. Get in contact with us right away if anything is awry.
  • For roses, leave the cardboard on for 2-4 hours while they are hydrating. After that, remove cardboard and place roses in a sunny spot so they will open to full capacity. If you’re not ready for them to fully open, keep them in a cooler, darker area. Note that once they open up, there is no going back!
  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water (don’t use scissors). Make sure everything has elbow room – no crowding.
  • Your roses will have lots of foliage on the stem, remove any foliage that falls below the waterline of your containers. When removing foliage, be very careful and gentle to not damage the stem. Removing any foliage that falls below the waterline will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.
  • Start arranging your flowers that evening or the following morning. Your flowers will need time to perk up and open.
Quantity Help

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of roses:

  • Bridal Bouquet: 7-9 stems
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 4-6 stems
  • Boutineers: 1 stem (consider ordering spray roses in a complementary colour for boutonnieres and corsages)
  • Corsages: 1-3 stems
  • Centerpieces: 5-7 stems
  • Large Arrangements: 15-20 stems
Product Video

Related products

  • Anenome – White Panda

    $55.00

  • Dianthus

    $30.00

  • White Hydrangea

    $35.00

  • Purple Alstromeria

    $30.00

The post Ivory Roses – Standard appeared first on You Floral.
